title: Insatiable Desires
description: In Book 2 of The Cleopatra Aspect, the story continues with Tia Sanchez entering into a bargain with bad boy billionaire Enrico Castello. According to the terms of their arrangement, it is a fake marriage of mutual convenience but Enrico wants more. Tia cannot connect to the partying playboy despite his attempts to seduce her. She flies into the arms of bodyguard and security surveillance owner Beau Hennessey. What will happen when Enrico finds out that Tia has fallen in love with another man?
author: A.J. Channing
